name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented R&D Engineer with 8 years of experience in full stack development, with a proven ability to build high-performance solutions in line with software development lifecycle and agile methodology. Expertise includes **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **FastAPI**, and **CI/CD**, with a solid background in cloud deployment across platforms such as **Azure** and **AWS**. Adept at creating and optimizing AI/LLM pipelines that enhance functionality and innovation, I have successfully led projects that integrate advanced data processing and predictive analytics, utilizing my deep understanding of modern technologies.

With strong problem-solving and communication skills, complemented by hands-on experience in software development, I am dedicated to delivering robust and secure applications. Proficient in version control with **Git** and familiar with best practices, my contributions have consistently aligned with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My ability to bridge the gap between complex technical concepts and actionable strategies drives successful project outcomes.
